title: Annual net income/loss of Zalando 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Net income/loss in million euros has fallen over the Year.
Net income/loss in million euros is roughly increasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The line significantly increased by 74.4 from Year 2014 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Net income/loss in million euros, about 121.5 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Net income/loss in million euros about 47.1 was reached at Year 2014
